hours_text:
## visit

**Yellowstone Art Museum**  
401 N 27th Street  
Billings, MT 59101  
__[406.256.6804](tel:14062566804)

**Visible Vault**  
**at the Yellowstone Art Museum**  
505 North 26th Street  
Billings, MT 59101  
__[406.256.6804](tel:14062566804)

[join today](http://artmuseum.org/engage/join-give/)

## Museum Hours and Admission

**Museum Admission is free for all Yellowstone County Residents thanks to g****enerous support provided by Art Bridges Foundation’s Access for All program****.**

**For visitors outside of Yellowstone County, admission is $8 for adults, $6 for seniors, and free to everyone 18 or under and guests with a student ID.**

[](https://www.artmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Access-for-All-Logo.png "Art Bridges Foundation’s Access for All  Logo")

**Museum Hours** |   
---|---  
Wednesday | 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.  
Thursday | 10 a.m. – 8 p.m.  
Friday | 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.  
Saturday | 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.  
Sunday | CLOSED  
Monday | CLOSED  
Tuesday | CLOSED  
|   
**Special Hours** |   
First Fridays | 10 a.m. – 8 p.m.  
  
## museum guide

Download the Museum Guide to plan your visit in advance – or pick one up at the main information desk when you arrive. Inside, a Museum Map will guide you through the exhibitions and galleries, and also point out helpful information such as restrooms, accessible features, and more.

[yam museum guide](https://www.artmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/YAM-Gallery-Layout-2025.pdf)

## **yam** promises

  * We promise to connect the contemporary past and present by preserving and exhibiting art.
  * We promise to inspire and educate curious minds of all ages.
  * We promise to enrich the community through interactive experiences and creative exchange.
  * We promise to collaborate with community partners.
  * We promise to be a social and intellectual hub for the community to create a sense of place.

## why invest in yam?

Your generous support helps us bring world-class exhibitions, art education, enrichment, and enjoyment to the Billings region and beyond.

[read more](http://artmuseum.org/engage/why-giving-matters/)
